Package model

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver

    public abstract class Sprite
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.image.ImageObserver
    Represents basic features of all sprites such as coordinates and image.
    Author:
    Roger

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private model.Coordinate characterPosition
      Stores current X and Y-Coordinates of sprite.
      protected controller.Controller controller
      Stores instance of controller which moves sprite based on user input.
      protected java.awt.Image currentSprite
      Stores current image of sprite to allow for animation.

      • getCaptionCoordinate

        public model.Coordinate getCaptionCoordinate​(model.Coordinate p,
                                             int offset)
        Getter method for the coordinates of the text above sprite.
        Parameters:
        p - X and Y-coordinates of the sprite.
        offset - value to adjust positioning pf caption in the Y-axis.
        Returns:
        Coordinate at which the caption should be placed to be above the sprite given the offset.
